name: (Not) a drop in the ocean!
description:
Showing the story of deforestation in a small country 

'(Not) a drop in the ocean?' is a visual novel where you get to play a character who understands the impacts of deforestation in a small area and correlates that to the effects on the outside world. 

Players are in the shoes of a flood victim in a large city in Bulgaria that experienced a flash flood. You try to assess the situation and converse with local volunteers and people who came from the entire country.  Click with your left mouse or use space to progress through the story.
